channel.title: Client and Source help?
channel.description:
I downloaded empirescape client and source. If i run the source and try and log in with the cient i should be able to get on it right??? When i do this and try and log in the login screen stays blank. i have tryed this with diffrent clients to. what do i do to get it to work :confused:
i am also running windows xp in safe mode
